sentences.sContent: I need some good pictures for narration.
sentences.sContent_eng: I need some good pictures for narration.
sentences.sCn: 我需要一些叙述时用的好镜头。

sentences.sContent: Her narration, she said, was meant to be ironic and self-mocking — “I find it very funny, almost obtuse.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her narration, she said, was meant to be ironic and self-mocking — “I find it very funny, almost obtuse.
sentences.sCn: 她的叙述，她说，本来是想讽刺和嘲笑自己的——“我觉得这很有趣，我觉得自己是如此愚钝”。

sentences.sContent: It includes narration by some of the finest actors and academics of the last half century including Sam Waterston, Arthur Miller, and Shelby Foote.
sentences.sContent_eng: It includes narration by some of the finest actors and academics of the last half century including Sam Waterston, Arthur Miller, and Shelby Foote.
sentences.sCn: 该片中还有上半个世纪中优秀演员和专业学者像萨姆·沃森，亚瑟·米勒以及谢尔比·福特等的叙述。

words.tran: 叙事的，叙述的；叙事体的

trans.tranOther: the act of telling a story
